testcase.classname: Book Flight and Hotel for Vacation
testcase.name: Book Flight for one way trip
testcase.system-out: Given I live in Dublin with 2 adults and 2 kids.............................passed And I want to book one way flight ticket from Dublin to London on 22nd Jan 2020.passed When I search online........................................................passed Then TripAdvisor should provide me options of flights on 22nd Jan 2020......passed And Cost of my flight should not be more than 50 Euro per person............passed And Tickets should be refundable............................................passed

testcase.classname: Book Flight and Hotel for Vacation
testcase.name: Book Hotel for one the trip
testcase.system-out: Given I need 1 room with 2 double beds......................................passed And I want to book hotel from 22nd Jan 2020 to 25th Jan 2020................passed When I search online........................................................passed Then TripAdvisor should provide me options of hotels for time period of 22nd Jan 2020 to 25th Jan 2020.passed And Fare of my room should not be more than 200 Euro per night..............passed And Breakfast should be included in the room fare...........................passed
